subject: App Crash Report
body: The app crashes on launch on my Samsung S22 running Android 14. Reinstalled twice.

subject: Feature Request: Dark Mode
body: Many users in my team prefer dark mode. Please consider adding this feature.

subject: Login Issue
body: Unable to login after recent update. Error code 401 appears repeatedly.

subject: Suggestion for Improvement
body: It would be great if tasks could be shared with family members.

subject: Data Loss Problem
body: Lost all my tasks after syncing. Using iPhone 14, iOS 17.
